catalysts.thesis: FDA acceptance of sNDA for AXS-05 (Alzheimer's Agitation) with Priority Review accelerates commercial timeline to April 2026, significantly de-risking the asset.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA granted Priority Review for AXS-05 sNDA on December 31, 2025; PDUFA set for April 30, 2026.
catalysts.absorption_status: News released Dec 31; Jan 2 represents the first post-holiday session to fully price in the accelerated regulatory path.
catalysts.recency_proof: BioSpace (2025-12-31): FDA grants AXS-05 Priority Review.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Market underestimated probability of Priority Review designation.

catalysts.thesis: FDA approval of Relacorilant for hypercortisolism solidifies Corcept's endocrinology franchise and removes a major overhang.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA PDUFA decision date for Relacorilant was December 30, 2025; Approval confirmed.
catalysts.absorption_status: Approved Dec 30; Jan 2 session likely to see continuation drift as institutional accumulation follows the binary event.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Stock trading at discount to peers with similar approved assets.

catalysts.thesis: Approval of Tradipitant for motion sickness creates a new niche revenue stream, validating the pipeline after previous setbacks.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA Approval of Tradipitant announced December 30, 2025.
catalysts.absorption_status: Initial reaction Dec 31; potentially unpriced follow-through on Jan 2 due to holiday volume thinning.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Low valuation relative to new approved TAM.
